summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Family Court Parent Record-Keeping App. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend navigation and core functionality working well with minor UI interaction issues in modals.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlays sometimes block navigation clicks, requiring force clicks
ui_bugs.selector: Dialog overlays with z-50 intercepting pointer events

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section, features, and testimonials
User login flow works correctly with testuser@example.com
Dashboard displays stats cards and quick actions
Navigation between all pages (Calendar, Journal, Violations, Documents, State Laws, Settings)
All backend APIs (30/30 tests passed): Auth, Children, Journals, Violations, Calendar, Documents, State Laws, Dashboard Stats, Export
State Laws page shows user's state (California) highlighted with court links
Registration page validation works (shows error for existing email)
Quick action buttons navigate to correct pages
User menu and logout functionality works
Export buttons present on relevant pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Modal overlay z-index issues causing navigation interference. Consider adding proper modal state management or reducing overlay z-index to prevent pointer event blocking.
